response.original_title: McGee and Me!: Beauty in the Least
response.overview: Nick's Romanian pen pal Ilie and his father unexpectedly visit the Martins just before Thanksgiving, initially causing disruption but ultimately teaching the family about love, hospitality, and the true meaning of Thanksgiving. Through their friendship with an eccentric homeless man and their involvement in a local soup kitchen, the episode emphasizes the lesson to "love your neighbor as yourself."
response.title: McGee and Me!: Beauty in the Least
